questiontext.text:
During a period of economic contraction (deflationary pressures), the Transportation Consumer Price Index for South Region changed from July 2015 to November 2016 as follows:

July 2015: 242.5

November 2016: 235.4

(Base: 2010 = 100)

Calculate the following (give answers to appropriate decimal places):

1. Period inflation rate: ___%

2. Annualized inflation rate: ___%

3. Average monthly inflation rate: ___%

4. CPI point increase: ___ points

5. Real value of $64575 at end of period (in July 2015 dollars): $___

During a period of stable economic growth (moderate inflation targeting), the All Items Consumer Price Index for South Region changed from December 2020 to July 2021 as follows:

December 2020: 269.1

July 2021: 273.6

(Base: 2000 = 100)

What is the annualized inflation rate? (Give your answer to appropriate decimal places)

During a period of high inflation (economic expansion with rising prices), the All Items Consumer Price Index for West Region changed from November 2023 to October 2024 as follows:

November 2023: 272.4

October 2024: 294.9

(Base: 2010 = 100)

What is the average monthly inflation rate? (Give your answer to appropriate decimal places)

generalfeedback.text:
Solution:

Total period inflation ÷ Number of months

= 8.26% ÷ 11 months

= 0.751%
